thread.title: Thought-provoking 'Love Song' is a call to action on climate
thread.title_full: Thought-provoking 'Love Song' is a call to action on climate

author: Noel Kirkpatrick
title: Thought-provoking 'Love Song' is a call to action on climate
text:
Tweet 
Created by the Climate Coalition, a collection of U.K. climate change organizations and charities, "A Love Song" pays tribute to the Earth — and its inhabitants — as actors Charles Dance, Miranda Richardson, Jason Isaacs and David Gyasi read a poem by Anthony Anaxagorou against a montage of scenes from our world. It's a powerful tribute to the planet and our place in it. Related on MNN:
